item.title: 7 horror films for this Halloween
item.description: Halloween season in full swing, possibly the best way to spend the upcoming weekend consists of a cup of coffee, a blanket, a horror-fest on your laptop and enormous courage! Here are seven favorite horror films you can challenge yourself with! The Shining (1980) The classic Stephen King novel adopted on screen by none other than the American maestro Stanley Kubrick. A house with a violent past, creepy corridors, ominous suspense, madness, murder, supernatural imagery, and everything you can think of that would lead to your worst nightmare.
